Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Alex Diaz
Dear Sir,
Alex Diaz shouldn't play at AA Jackson Mets!
He has an AVG of .229 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Domingo Cedeno
Dear Sir,
Domingo Cedeno isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Jackson Mets!
He has an AVG of .114, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
